timeline.message:
added fullscreen module, which contains the fullscreen.component, which will wrap its child components add a button on the bottom right corner to enable toggle fullscreen mode for the wrapped elements
added fullscreen component to modelling-submission.component

moved css to fullscreen.scss
added own translation placeholders for fullscreen component
make button configurable - compact and extended + positional argument (top-left, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-right corner)
added exit fullscreen text for fullscreen.component.html

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/develop' into feature/fullscreen_mode_modelling_editor

# Conflicts:
#	src/main/webapp/app/exercises/modeling/participate/modeling-participation.module.ts
#	src/main/webapp/app/exercises/modeling/participate/modeling-submission.component.html
#	src/test/javascript/spec/component/modeling-submission/modeling-submission.component.spec.ts
